summary: This is an email chain from August 10, 2019, forwarding an urgent request about a potential leak of information from the hospital regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death to the OIG/FBI. It indicates internal concern about unauthorized disclosures shortly after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Indiaye
persons.context: Appears as the original sender of the forwarded email about a potential leak regarding Epstein's death, using a bop.gov email address.

events.title: Email about potential hospital leak regarding Epstein's death
events.description: An email is sent and forwarded, raising an urgent concern about a potential leak of information from the hospital regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

keyFacts: An urgent request was made on August 10, 2019, regarding a potential leak of information from the hospital about Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The request was specifically directed to be given to the OIG (Office of the Inspector General) and the FBI.
The communication originated from a Bureau of Prisons (bop.gov) email address, indicating internal government concern about the security of information.
